section.p: ‘Bless you!’ he says, and indeed as he speaks those words you acquire the blessing of . Note this on your Adventure Sheet. It can be used once to negate the effect of disease or poison, and then you must cross it off.
‘You can get more blessings like that from the temple of Maka,’ says Knocklar. ‘Tell them I sent you and you might get a discount. Now, if you’ll excuse me...’
